channel.title: I can't open things... and I look like a guy? and a question about member items
channel.description: Okay, I made a server and when I logged in... I looked like a guy? And I can't figure out how to open stuff? Like I can't talk to NPC's... Or open gates or anything... why? and if you're in MoparScape... can you do members stuff? Also, I can't find like any NPC's. Please reply soon... I might just be an idiot and have done something wrong... so please, someone help me ^^ I'll give you a smore :D

item.title: I can't open things... and I look like a guy? and a question about member items
item.dc:creator: @Mandysummers3 Mandysummers3
item.description:
@Mandysummers3 wrote:

Okay, I made a server and when I logged in… I looked like a guy? And I can’t figure out how to open stuff? Like I can’t talk to NPC’s… Or open gates or anything… why? and if you’re in MoparScape… can you do members stuff? Also, I can’t find like any NPC’s. Please reply soon… I might just be an idiot and have done something wrong… so please, someone help me ^^ I’ll give you a smore

Read full topic
item.source: I can't open things... and I look like a guy? and a question about member items
